Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , Dark X-Men , Past
Real Name: Amahl Farouk
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
ALL THAT REMAINS...SHADOW: Mind Control. When Shadow King uses it and hits, after resolutions heal him 1 click and give each hit character a Servant token.
AND I WILL BE ITS KING: Toughness. Mastermind, but may choose a non-attacking opposing character with a Servant token within range to become the target. If you do, after resolutions remove that character's Servant token.

July 25, 2022
C-Dog
Just waiting for a tiny car is released as a vehicle. I'll get 8 of them to go with my 8 Shadow Kings for my Shriner's theme team.
July 24, 2021
Goop
Kind of an interesting design where you sort of want to do both MC and PB depending on game state. The downside is all his point value is put into his ability to mastermind to your opponents. Super cool, very powerful however extremely vulnerable to outwit. You get your mastermind outwitted and he's significantly overcosted for 100pts. MUCH better at his lower point line.
June 4, 2021
Dortmuner
Yeah, he and Exodus are my two biggest wants of what I've seen so far. That 8 range with three bolts and IT Hindering makes him a Mind Control beast. Healing when you hit and no requirement for line of fire with the special Mastermind gives him sustainability. Or just use his penetrating attacks from 8 squares away. If you're concerned about AV, slap the Power Gem on him. Course then you really do have a choice to make between MC or 5 penetrating damage.
June 4, 2021
PoptartDinosaur
Very cool piece. Mind control with 3 targets, then can mastermind the damage back to them. Only downside is those attack values are pretty bad. Probably will run him with exospex to give him stealth at least!
